info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 9:23PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Blaine and northeastern Hill Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 923 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong winds from showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 31 miles northwest of Chinook to 10 miles southwest of Hays. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chinook, Harlem, Fort Belknap, Lohman, Hogeland, Cleveland and Zurich. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 386 and 445. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
